issue.title: discordbotlist.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://discordbotlist.com/bots/poketwo/upvote](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscordbotlist.com%2Fbots%2Fpoketwo%2Fupvote) ### Comment > When trying to upvote the Discord bot it says to disable the Ad blocker. > > To reproduce: > 1. issue.title: Ozon.ru (mobile)

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Content Blocker

### AdGuard version

21.11.24

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Yandex Browser

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Ozon.ru

### Ad Blocking

EasyList

### Privacy

EasyPrivacy

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList Cookie List

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

performed_via_github_app.name: GitHub Actions
performed_via_github_app.description: Automate your workflow from idea to production

issue.title: anime1.me

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://anime1.me/category/2024年秋季/膽大黨](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fanime1.me%2Fcategory%2F2024%E5%B9%B4%E7%A7%8B%E5%AD%A3%2F%E8%86%BD%E5%A4%A7%E9%BB%A8) ### Comment > Video on website does not play when Adguard is enabled. Using Safari plugin to disbale Adguard on website does not work, and video only plays when Adguard is disabled system wide. However, if using Microsoft Edge, videos functions normally on website. ### Screenshots

Block trackers DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.controld.com/m5jiwi9j8o`

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
